attributes.action: Stop Brands Testing on Animals within the UK
attributes.additional_details: For Too long now animals have been neglected tested on used as objects, defenceless animals used to test products, with the government help we want you to ban the testing of animals from Brands within the UK, free the animals that have been harmed and charge companies that continue to neglect animals with the animal cruelty act.
attributes.background: We want the government to ban the testing of any products on animal from companies within the UK and ban the sale of any uk brand companies until they stop testing on animals.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581641
